name: plot-palette
description: AWS serverless synthetic data generation platform

scripts.test:e2e: docker compose up -d --wait && PYTHONPATH=. AWS_ENDPOINT_URL=http://localhost:4566 pytest tests/e2e -v --tb=short; PYTEST_EXIT=$?; docker compose down; exit $PYTEST_EXIT
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && npx tsc --noEmit
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run lint:backend && npm run build && npm test && npm run test:backend
